thread.title: Liberal Protesters Thought They Could Burn the Flag, FedEx Driver Delivers a SURPRISING Package
thread.title_full: Liberal Protesters Thought They Could Burn the Flag, FedEx Driver Delivers a SURPRISING Package

author: John S. Roberts
title: Liberal Protesters Thought They Could Burn the Flag, FedEx Driver Delivers a SURPRISING Package
text:
It really didn’t matter to the left who won the 2016 presidential election. 
They’ll say they wanted Hillary or Bernie to run the country and everything would’ve been hunky-dory, but it was a lie. 
Progressive radicals were never going to change their opinions of America. They weren’t going to stop burning the flag or protesting “injustices” or hating on cops. 
They just wanted to continue being taken care of by big daddy government. That’s it. 
At a protest this morning in Iowa, Old Glory was about to go up in flames. 
Then, a FedEx driver put an end to the nonsense with the help of a fire extinguisher… 
From IJ Review : 
A small protest in Iowa over “racial and social injustice and U.S. imperialism” almost turned violent Thursday, after a FedEx driver who witnessed an American flag being burned decided to put a stop it—with his bare hands and a fire extinguisher. 
[Editor’s note: the following video contains language that some viewers may find offensive.] 
The FedEx driver, identified as Matt Uhrin, declined to comment, saying only that his actions don’t represent his employer. 
Matt Uhrin, a true patriot. 
Two people were arrested. 
They face a $625 fine and up to 30 days in jail. LIKE this article?
